### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#28686](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28686) (refactor: Split per-peer parts of net module into new node/connection module by ajtowns)
* [#28658](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28658) (type-safe(r) GenTxid constructors by instagibbs)
* [#28107](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28107) (util: Type-safe transaction identifiers by dergoegge)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

$ echo "Af//////Oqf/AP8TAf8AEPr/AQAApZL6/wEA/1sB/wBbAAClkpJ4eP//S0tL/Q==" | base64 -d > orphanage_crash
$ FUZZ=txorphan ./src/test/fuzz/fuzz orphanage_crash
...
test/fuzz/txorphan.cpp:98 operator(): Assertion `orphanage.BytesFromPeer(peer_id) >= ref->GetTotalSize()' failed.
...

s/expired/expired_wtxids/
can remove this and use size of `expired(_wtxids)` set isntead
please remove this return https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28031#discussion_r1326094730

could this get mechanically asserted as extra-belt-and-suspender
might as well capture the return and check it here too
Putting this in draft to focus review attention on the mempool stuff.
Uh, unsure what a r-lambda function is and pretty sure calling something else doesn't make sense so I'm resolving this comment.
Going to resolve comments + fuzz failure, and then add a `getorphanagestats` RPC before taking out of draft.
